attributes.action: Stop England sinking under the weight of immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time to stop. 

England is a small country by international standards. The impact of this mass immigration (both legal and illegal) is impacting on all goods and services and is not sustainable (housing, schools, employment, national health services and welfare services). 

The first political party that comes out with this message will win an election. There is such a thing a 'one issue politics'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
